headline.print_headline: Comic-Con Gets First Look at 'Mockingjay' Trailer
headline.main: Comic-Con Gets First Look at 'Mockingjay' Trailer

lead_paragraph: The trailer for the next film in the popular "Hunger Games" series is making its premiere at Comic-Con.
